response.original_title: The Better Sex Guide To Anal Pleasure
response.overview: Jack Morin, Ph.D., the world`s leading expert on anal eroticism and sexual health, hosts a frank and factual overview of this exotic, much misunderstood sexual practice. Couples who wish to leave no territory unexplored will find this program to be an incredible resource. Watch as real couples demonstrate in detail the pleasure potential of anal encounters.
response.tagline: Enhance Your Sexual Life by Exploring Anal Sex
response.title: The Better Sex Guide To Anal Pleasure
